column4: Hello! I tried to change my login password via System/Admin/Users and Groups and now I have to use my old password to log in to ubuntu and my new one to unlock the keyring. How can I change the login password, or make them both the same?
open a terminal and type "passwd" without quote and press enter
you have to set the default cursor for X. This is usually done with a .Xdefaults file in your home directory.
